solution_line_template: The total number of apples delivered was {apples_per_crate} * {crates_delivered} = <<{apples_per_crate}*{crates_delivered}={total_apples_delivered}>>{total_apples_delivered}.
There are {total_apples_delivered} - {rotten_apples} = <<{total_apples_delivered}-{rotten_apples}={remaining_apples}>>{remaining_apples} apples were left remaining.
Finally, there are {remaining_apples} / {apples_per_box} = <<{remaining_apples}/{apples_per_box}={number_of_boxes}>>{number_of_boxes} boxes of apples.
